headline: UH-OH: Whopping Percentage Of Dem Voters Want Hillary Investigated For Russiagate Scandal
author: Hank Berrien
sentences:
The Post reported that “91 percent of Republicans in the same group and 65 percent of Independents also called for Clinton to specifically be investigated,” adding, “76 percent of Americans want Attorney General Merrick Garland’s counsel Maggie Goodlander to recuse herself from the Durham probe because of a potential personal conflict posed by her husband, White House National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan, who is cited in the Sussmann indictment.”
